project_descr: This project aims at rebuilding the livelihoods of the affected communities; assisting NDMO on risk assessment given ongoing risk and the possibility of flashfloods; establishing a bottom-up early warning system for geological hazards.

outputs.output_descr: Rebuilding the livelihoods of the affected communities; assisting NDMO on risk assessment given ongoing risk and the possibility of flashfloods; and establishing a bottom-up early warning system for geological hazards.

project_title: recovery assistance for earthquake & tsunami rendova
